thread.title: Hipfig Introduces Its Travel Presentations on Seoul and Offers Free Advertisement Platform to Local Vendors
thread.title_full: Hipfig Introduces Its Travel Presentations on Seoul and Offers Free Advertisement Platform to Local Vendors

author: Hipfig.com
title: Hipfig Introduces Its Travel Presentations on Seoul and Offers Free Advertisement Platform to Local Vendors
text: Receive press releases from Hipfig.com: By Email RSS Feeds: Hipfig Introduces Its Travel Presentations on Seoul and Offers Free Advertisement Platform to Local Vendors Seoul, South Korea travel information is now available on Hipfig.com. Hipfigs Seoul series provides extensive travel information and videos on Seoul to help travelers. Hipfig.coms presentations are useful guides with videos to make travel planning and decisions easier, especially for first time travelers and for family travel. Bellevue, WA, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Seoul, South Korea travel information is now available on Hipfig.com. Hipfig’s Seoul series provides extensive travel information and videos on Seoul to help travelers. Hipfig.com’s presentations are useful guides with videos to make travel planning and decisions easier, especially for first time travelers and for family travel.This week Hipfig.com is highlighting this very popular Asian city, Seoul, on Hipfig’s website. Travelers planning vacations can now consider traveling to the Seoul through Hipfig.com Seoul section. Hipfig.com videos show Seoul’s colorful palaces, grand museums, and bulging cityscape. Using Hipfig.com’s information and videos, travelers can plan and carry-out their travel to Seoul with ease and confidence.Higfig.com’s information covers insider tips, insights, and knowledge needed to plan your trip for Seoul. The Planning section on Hipfig.com offers practical tips including budgeting help, tips, and hotel neighborhood information in Seoul. The On Arrival section on Hipfig.com helps travelers understand public transportation (Seoul Subway), currency exchange ($Won), getting from Airport to hotel and much more. The Top Tourist Attractions section on Hipfig.com for Seoul provides information and recommendation for top attractions for family & individuals. Each section on Hipfig.com on Seoul is jam-packed with real travel experience, tips, and information to simplify travel for families and individual travelers to Seoul.Travelers can read the Seoul information on Hipfig’s website, watch videos on Seoul, and if required ask an expert from hipfig.com to make informed travel decisions. All available Seoul related video presentations can be viewed either on hipfig.com Seoul section or the Hipfig Travel-Channel on Youtube.In addition, Hipfig.com has added a free advertisement platform for local Seoul vendors to advertise their services and products to travelers coming from all over the world. Local Seoul vendors can now go to Hipfig.com to reach an international audience from more than 40 countries.Hipfig.com is a US based startup. Hipfig.com is a new venture dedicated to assist the First Time Travelers and Family Travel. Hipfig.com is a Helpful, Informative, Practical, Fun, International Guide dedicated to helping the First Time International Traveler and Family Travel. Hipfig.com’s goal is to be the one stop guide providing a repository for all travel information for the First Time International Traveler and Family Travel. Contact Information
